page.title: 05SCHOOLS 1 (First schools)
page.content: {BROWICK ROAD SCHOOL (Mr Gleadhill) I walk to our school,which starts at 9.00 a.m. After the bell rings I go to my classroom. All six classes go to Assembly which is either acted out as a play by a class or taken by our Headmistress,Mrs.Warman. Afterwards, we probably work in our Maths books until playtime at 10.30 a.m. At 12.00 noon we line up for lunch. I have a cooked dinner but I could take a packed lunch. After lunch we play until 1.15 p.m. when school starts again. We may do English work, or have choir practice with Miss Wade, or go out to football with Mr.Banham, our Caretaker. We say a prayer before going home at 3.00 p.m. {ASHLEIGH FIRST SCHOOL (Mrs Harrison)} This school was opened in 1972 to accommodate the increasing number of children in Wymondham.
